wkf-model.name: Inventory
wkf-model.diagramXml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <bpmn2:definitions xmlns:bpmn2="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:camunda="http://camunda.org/schema/1.0/bpmn" xmlns:bioc="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn/biocolor/1.0" xmlns:color="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/non-normative/color/1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" id="sample-diagram" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" xs:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL BPMN20.xsd" camunda:code="BPM-5" camunda:diagramName="Inventory" camunda:wkfStatusColor="blue" camunda:appBuilder="BPM-5"> <bpmn2:process id="Process_Inventory" name="Inventory Flow" isExecutable="true"> <bpmn2:extensionElements> <camunda:processConfiguration> <camunda:processConfigurationParameter metaModel="Inventory" metaModelLabel="Inventory (Inventory)" isStartModel="true" model="com.axelor.apps.stock.db.Inventory" metaModelFullName="com.axelor.apps.stock.db.Inventory" title="Inventory" /> </camunda:processConfiguration> </bpmn2:extensionElements> <bpmn2:startEvent id="StartEvent_1" name="Start"> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_1yumssz</bpmn2:outgoing> </bpmn2:startEvent> <bpmn2:endEvent id="Event_12pssw5" name="End"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_1yv1xcv</bpmn2:incoming> </bpmn2:endEvent> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1yv1xcv" sourceRef="Activity_1trov39" targetRef="Event_12pssw5" /> <bpmn2:subProcess id="Activity_1trov39" name="Create Inventory Lines"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_0kk6b5a</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_1yv1xcv</bpmn2:outgoing> <bpmn2:multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics isSequential="true" camunda:collection="${productList}" camunda:elementVariable="product" /> <bpmn2:startEvent id="Event_0ikybaf" name="Draft"> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_13zr52p</bpmn2:outgoing> </bpmn2:startEvent> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_13zr52p" sourceRef="Event_0ikybaf" targetRef="Activity_1xmu7dh" /> <bpmn2:endEvent id="Event_1y06jpc" name="Done"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_07dwet0</bpmn2:incoming> </bpmn2:endEvent> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_07dwet0" sourceRef="Activity_1xmu7dh" targetRef="Event_1y06jpc" /> <bpmn2:scriptTask id="Activity_1xmu7dh" name="Create LIne" scriptFormat="axelor" camunda:query="false" camunda:scriptValue="{"fields":[{"name":"currentQty","type":"DECIMAL","condition":null,"conditionMeta":null,"value":{"selected":{"value":50},"from":"none","subFields":[]}},{"name":"inventory","type":"MANY_TO_ONE","target":"Inventory","condition":null,"conditionMeta":null,"value":{"from":"context","selected":{"value":"inventory"},"subFields":[{"id":462,"version":0,"title":"Inventory","name":"Inventory","type":"metaModel","fullName":"com.axelor.apps.stock.db.Inventory"}]}},{"name":"processInstanceId","type":"STRING","condition":null,"conditionMeta":null,"value":{"selected":{"value":""},"from":"none","subFields":[]}},{"name":"product","type":"MANY_TO_ONE","target":"Product","condition":null,"conditionMeta":null,"value":{"from":"context","selected":{"value":"product"},"subFields":[{"id":148,"version":0,"title":"Product","name":"Product","type":"metaModel","fullName":"com.axelor.apps.base.db.Product"}]}},{"name":"unit","type":"MANY_TO_ONE","target":"Unit","condition":null,"conditionMeta":null,"value":{"from":"context","selected":{"value":"product?.unit"},"subFields":[{"id":148,"version":0,"title":"Product","name":"Product","type":"metaModel","fullName":"com.axelor.apps.base.db.Product"},{"title":"Unit","name":"unit","type":"MANY_TO_ONE","target":"com.axelor.apps.base.db.Unit"}]}}],"targetModel":"InventoryLine","sourceModel":"","sourceModelList":[],"newRecord":true,"savedRecord":false,"save":true,"isJson":false,"createVariable":false,"processId":null,"modelFrom":{"title":"Context","id":"context"}}"> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_13zr52p</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_07dwet0</bpmn2:outgoing> <bpmn2:script>def rec = $ctx.create('InventoryLine') rec.currentQty = 50 rec.inventory = $ctx.find('Inventory',inventory?.id)?.getTarget() rec.processInstanceId = '' rec.product = $ctx.find('Product',product?.id)?.getTarget() rec.unit = $ctx.find('Unit',product?.unit?.id)?.getTarget() return $ctx.save(rec)</bpmn2:script> </bpmn2:scriptTask> </bpmn2:subProcess> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_0kk6b5a" sourceRef="Activity_12e7yed" targetRef="Activity_1trov39" /> <bpmn2:scriptTask id="Activity_12e7yed" name="Fetch products" scriptFormat="axelor" camunda:resultVariable="productList" camunda:query="true" camunda:scriptValue="[{"metaModalName":"Product","metaModalType":"metaModel","rules":[{"id":0,"parentId":-1,"combinator":"and","rules":[{"fieldName":"stockManaged","operator":"isTrue","fieldValue":null,"fieldValue2":null,"isRelationalValue":null,"relatedValueFieldName":null,"relatedValueModal":null,"fieldType":"BOOLEAN","field":{"massUpdate":true,"defaultValue":true,"name":"stockManaged","type":"BOOLEAN","title":"Stock managed"},"isShow":false,"allField":[{"massUpdate":true,"defaultValue":true,"name":"stockManaged","type":"BOOLEAN","title":"Stock managed"}]}]}]}]" camunda:scriptOperatorType="and" camunda:checked="false"> <bpmn2:extensionElements /> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_1wu3g6w</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_0kk6b5a</bpmn2:outgoing> <bpmn2:script>return $ctx.createVariable($ctx.filter("Product","self.stockManaged is ?1", true))</bpmn2:script> </bpmn2:scriptTask> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1yumssz" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="Activity_1f77kk7" /> <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1wu3g6w" sourceRef="Activity_1f77kk7" targetRef="Activity_12e7yed" /> <bpmn2:userTask id="Activity_1f77kk7" name="Create Lines" camunda:modelerTemplate="com.camunda.example.CustomProperty" camunda:completedIf="" camunda:metaModel="Inventory" camunda:metaModelModelName="com.axelor.apps.stock.db.Inventory" camunda:metaModelLabel="Inventory" camunda:defaultForm="inventory-form" camunda:buttonLabels="Create Inventory From BPM" camunda:buttons="createInventoryBpm"> <bpmn2:extensionElements> <camunda:properties> <camunda:property name="completedIf" value="purchaseOrder.attachmentCount > 0" /> <camunda:property name="buttons" value="createLines" /> </camunda:properties> </bpmn2:extensionElements> <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_1yumssz</bpmn2:incoming> <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_1wu3g6w</bpmn2:outgoing> </bpmn2:userTask> </bpmn2:process> <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_1"> <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_1" bpmnElement="Process_Inventory"> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_1wu3g6w_di" bpmnElement="Flow_1wu3g6w" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="40" y="240" /> <di:waypoint x="120" y="240" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_1yumssz_di" bpmnElement="Flow_1yumssz" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="-92" y="240" /> <di:waypoint x="-60" y="240" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_0kk6b5a_di" bpmnElement="Flow_0kk6b5a" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="220" y="240" /> <di:waypoint x="280" y="240" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_1yv1xcv_di" bpmnElement="Flow_1yv1xcv" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="640" y="240" /> <di:waypoint x="752" y="240" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2" bpmnElement="StartEvent_1" bioc:stroke="#55c041" bioc:fill="#ccecc6" color:background-color="#ccecc6" color:border-color="#55c041"> <dc:Bounds x="-128" y="222" width="36" height="36" /> <bpmndi:BPMNLabel> <dc:Bounds x="-122" y="265" width="24" height="14" /> </bpmndi:BPMNLabel> </bpmndi:BPMNShape> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Event_12pssw5_di" bpmnElement="Event_12pssw5" bioc:stroke="#ff7043" bioc:fill="#ffd4c7" color:background-color="#ffd4c7" color:border-color="#ff7043"> <dc:Bounds x="752" y="222" width="36" height="36" /> <bpmndi:BPMNLabel> <dc:Bounds x="761" y="265" width="20" height="14" /> </bpmndi:BPMNLabel> </bpmndi:BPMNShape> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Activity_0edyqwd_di" bpmnElement="Activity_1trov39" isExpanded="true" bioc:stroke="#6097fc" bioc:fill="#e4ebf8" color:background-color="#e4ebf8" color:border-color="#6097fc"> <dc:Bounds x="280" y="140" width="360" height="200" /> </bpmndi:BPMNShape> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_07dwet0_di" bpmnElement="Flow_07dwet0" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="510" y="230" /> <di:waypoint x="562" y="230" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_13zr52p_di" bpmnElement="Flow_13zr52p" bioc:stroke="#8095b3" color:border-color="#8095b3"> <di:waypoint x="358" y="230" /> <di:waypoint x="410" y="230" /> </bpmndi:BPMNEdge> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Event_0ikybaf_di" bpmnElement="Event_0ikybaf" bioc:stroke="#55c041" bioc:fill="#ccecc6" </bpmndi:BPMNLabel> </bpmndi:BPMNShape> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Event_1y06jpc_di" bpmnElement="Event_1y06jpc" bioc:stroke="#ff7043" bioc:fill="#ffd4c7" color:background-color="#ffd4c7" color:border-color="#ff7043"> <dc:Bounds x="562" y="212" width="36" height="36" /> <bpmndi:BPMNLabel> <dc:Bounds x="567" y="255" width="27" height="14" /> </bpmndi:BPMNLabel> </bpmndi:BPMNShape> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Activity_0efluv2_di" bpmnElement="Activity_1xmu7dh" bioc:stroke="#ff9e0f" bioc:fill="#ffeed4" color:background-color="#ffeed4" color:border-color="#ff9e0f"> <dc:Bounds x="410" y="190" width="100" height="80" /> </bpmndi:BPMNShape> <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Activity_1npxtyw_di" bpmnElement="Activity_12e7yed" bioc:stroke="#ff9e0f" bioc:fill="#ffeed4" </bpmndi:BPMNShape> </bpmndi:BPMNPlane> </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram> </bpmn2:definitions>
